name: CondaClientInstaller
description: Install task for the Miniconda client
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: installLatest
inputs.label: Install the latest version of Conda for your environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: If installing the latest, pythonMinorVersion and condaVersion values are ignored.

inputs.name: pythonMajorVersion
inputs.label: choose the version of python bundled with Conda
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between version 3 and 2 of Python.

inputs.name: pythonMinorVersion
inputs.label: choose the minor version of python required
inputs.helpMarkDown: A string representing the minor version of python to use. Latest used if blank.

inputs.name: condaVersion
inputs.label: choose the version of conda to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: A string representing the version of Miniconda to use. Latest used if blank. Versions can be browsed at: https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/

inputs.name: processorArchitecture
inputs.label: choose between different CPU architectures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please select which architecture to use

inputs.name: installPath
inputs.label: Specify where conda will be installed on the agent.

messages.UnsupportedOSPlatform: The agent's OS: %s is not supported. Supported OS types are: %s
messages.FailedToRunTask: There was an unexpected error while running the Task.
messages.FailedToRunCondaInstaller: Conda installer exited with a non-zero return code. Code: %s
